attributes.action: 100,000 to 1 million + signatures needed to force a  general election
attributes.additional_details:
the lack of confidence that the uk government isnt listening to the people of the country and the lack of confidence in democracy

we need a general election to rid the houses of parliament of the mp's who have self interest only and dont work for the people
the current vote for the  eu referendum shows the fact that the people wanted  a referendum but the governemt doesnt
the people should now decide to remove all mps either government or opposition that dont follow the wishes of their constituents
